Summary: I see them all the time and I take photos of them. I see them but other people cant. I dont know why.
divs: Sighting Detailsit was outside my home in the sky, so i got my camera and took a photo. This is NOT a joke i see them all the time and i take photos of them. I would love to show you the photos but im not very good on a computer and dont know how to send them.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Perth
There were no other sightings in Perth on or around December 12th 2006
